item.title: Installing Virtualbox On Ubuntu Server 14.04
item.description: For some reasons, my computer just only installed Ubuntu Server 14.04 system. But sometimes I need to use Windows system to test our project, so I think if I can install virtualbox on the Ubuntu Server, and then manage the virtualbox by website. How to do that?
